concept.definition: Denotes a durational rest.
Denotes a measure or multi-measure rest.
Rhythmic value indicating one hundred twenty-eighth the duration of a whole note.
Rhythmic value indicating one hundred twenty-eighth the duration of a semibreve.
Rhythmic value indicating one sixty-fourth the duration of a whole note.
Rhythmic value indicating one sixty-fourth the duration of a semibreve.
Rhythmic value indicating one thirty-second the duration of a whole note.
Rhythmic value indicating one thirty-second the duration of a semibreve.
Rhythmic value indicating one sixteenth the duration of a whole note.
Rhythmic value indicating one sixteenth the duration of a semibreve.
Rhythmic value indicating one eighth the duration of a whole note.
Rhythmic value indicating one eighth the duration of a semibreve.
Rhythmic value indicating one quarter the duration of a whole note.
Rhythmic value indicating one quarter the duration of a semibreve.
Rhythmic value indicating one half the duration of a whole note.
Rhythmic value indicating one half the duration of a semibreve.
Rhythmic value of length four beats in common time.
Rhythmic value of length four beats in common time.
Rhythmic value indicating the duration of two whole notes.
Rhythmic value indicating the duration of two semibreves.
Rhythmic value indicating the duration of four (or six) whole notes.
Rhythmic value indicating the duration of four (or six) semibreves.
